SaveModal.private.title: Save your story in private
SaveModal.public.text: By posting your story, you will allow all users to see it. To continue, please choose a title for your story.
SaveModal.private.text: By choosing to save your story as private, only you will be able to view it. You can change this setting later. You can change this choice later. Choose a title for your story.

RestartStoryModal.title: Start a new story
RestartStoryModal.text: Want to start a new story? You can delete the current story or save it to resume later.
